TypeSignature.Value: public class AccessRule<T> : System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule where T : struct
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessRule`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public Class AccessRule(Of T) Inherits AccessRule
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic ref class AccessRule : System::Security::AccessControl::AccessRule
type AccessRule<'T (requires 'T : struct)> = class inherit AccessRule

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 存取規則的存取權限類型。

span.span: The access rights type for the access rule.

summary.span: 表示使用者的識別 (Identity)、存取遮罩和存取控制 (Access Control) 型別 (允許或拒絕) 的組合。

span.span: Represents a combination of a user's identity, an access mask, and an access control type (allow or deny).

summary.span: AccessRule\`1 物件還包含子物件如何繼承規則，以及如何傳用該繼承的相關資訊。

span.span: An AccessRule\`1 object also contains information about the how the rule is inherited by child objects and how that inheritance is propagated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取權限 （權限） 相關的型別 T，您可以類型轉換至或從 int。例如，您可以轉型的存取權限類型，然後使用執行個體正常。Access rights (permissions) are type T, which you can type-cast to or from an int. For example, you can cast a as the access rights type, and then use the instance normally. 相反地，一律會採用存取權限是 int 類型。In contrast, always takes access rights of type int.

summary.span: 使用指定的值，初始化 AccessRule’1 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the AccessRule’1 class by using the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含型別相同的資訊為 AccessMask 屬性，但轉換\。This property contains the same information as the AccessMask property, but cast as type \.
